name: serverless-pagespeed-monitoring
description: Puppeteer on AWS Lambda for monitoring pagespeed

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz src && cd src && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd src && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
